nodes.text: The Sea of Translucency was a sea that was located on the world of Dremulae.
The sea was a popular galactic tourist attraction, even for those luxury-travelers wishing to opt for a holographic simulation experience—a sim-vacation, or sim-voyage.
In 24 BBY, the Human Astri Oddo mentioned that her husband, Senator Bog Divinian, had claimed that he would soon be wealthy enough to purchase a villa located next to the Sea of Translucency.
